colorf.name: indoor ambient radiosity color#the indoor ambient light color

float32.name: indoor ambient radiosity power#the indoor ambient light power from 0 to infinity

colorf.name: outdoor ambient radiosity color#the outdoor ambient light color

float32.name: outdoor ambient radiosity power#the outdoor ambient light power from 0 to infinity
outdoor fog maximum density:[0,1]#density at opaque distance - 0 defaults to 1
outdoor fog start distance:world units#below this distance there is no fog
outdoor fog opaque distance:world units#beyond this distance surfaces are completely fogged
indoor fog maximum density:[0,1]#density at opaque distance - 0 defaults to 1
indoor fog start distance:world units#below this distance there is no fog
indoor fog opaque distance:world units#beyond this distance surfaces are completely fogged

tagRef.name: indoor fog screen#used for FOG SCREEN only; not used for planar fog

ascii.name: global function name^#the global function that controls this shader value

int16.name: animation index#the index of the animation in the animation graph

reflexive.name: lights

ascii.name: lens flare marker name#the lens flare for this light will be attached to the specified marker in the model

reflexive.comment: these parameters control how the light illuminates the world.

float32.name: test distance#the length of the ray for shadow testing.

degree.name: direction#direction toward the light source in the sky. y
direction#direction toward the light source in the sky. p
diameter#angular diameter of the light source in the sky.
